conversation.message:
Dear Parent_B,

Thank you for checking in again, and I appreciate your continued patience.

1) Internal deadline: we have set a firm internal decision point for the end of Round 28. By then, we will either have a confirmed acceptance from a family ahead of you in our admissions priority order, or we will close out that outreach.

2) If no confirmed acceptance is received by that point: we will move immediately to the next “ready-to-confirm” families and extend an offer with a short confirmation window (same-day confirmation/registration, typically within a few hours).

At this time, the place remains reserved for higher-priority families, so we are not reopening consideration this round. If we do reach the Round 28 trigger without a higher-priority acceptance, we will contact you promptly with the exact window and steps.

Sincerely,
Nursery_D Admissions
